title: LailaMajnu
description: The story revolves around two young lovers, Laila and Qais (Majnu), whose families oppose their relationship, leading to a passionate but ultimately doomed romance.

title: Rokstar
description: Rockstar is a 2011 Hindi romantic drama film about Janardhan Jakhar, a young man who aspires to be a rockstar and believes that pain and suffering are essential for musical creativity.

title: Andaaz apna apna
description: Andaz Apna Apna is a 1994 Indian Hindi-language comedy film about two aimless young men, Amar and Prem, who both try to marry a wealthy heiress, Raveena, to get rich quick.

title: Heeramandi
description: a historical red-light district in Lahore, Pakistan, known for its grand brothels and the musical performances of courtesans.

title: Avtar
description: A science fiction film set in the 22nd century on Pandora, a lush moon of a gas giant.

title: Avengers
description: A team of superheroes from Marvel Comics, primarily featured in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU).

title: Wednesday
description: Journey od Wednesday Addams, Tasked with mastering her psychic abilities, she confronts a series of town murders and a haunting family mystery from 25 years ago, all while managing new social dynamics.

title: Stranger Things
description: Stranger Things is a sci-fi horror web series set in the 1980s in the fictional town of Hawkins, Indiana, It follows a group of kids who uncover a secret government experiment that has opened a portal to a dangerous parallel dimension called the Upside Down.

title: Aarya
description: Aarya is an Indian crime thriller web series created by Ram Madhvani, mother whose life turns upside down when her husband, involved in an illegal drug business, is mysteriously killed.

title: The Vampire Diaries
description: The Vampire Diaries is a supernatural drama series set in the fictional town of Mystic Falls, revolving around the lives, loves, dangers, and disasters of its residents—many of whom are vampires, witches, and werewolves.

title: Money Heist
description: Money Heist is a Spanish heist crime drama that follows a mysterious mastermind known as The Professor, who recruits eight skilled criminals to carry out two ambitious heists — one on the Royal Mint of Spain and another on the Bank of Spain.

title: Mismatched
description: Mismatched, coming-of-age romantic drama about two young people from very different worlds who meet at a summer tech course, navigating friendship, love, and personal ambitions.

title: Squid Game
description: Squid Game is a South Korean survival thriller series where hundreds of financially struggling contestants compete in deadly versions of children’s games for a massive cash prize.

title: The Good Doctor
description: A heartfelt medical drama about an autistic surgical resident with savant syndrome overcoming prejudice to showcase his medical brilliance..

title: Sweet Home
description: A South Korean apocalyptic horror series where residents of an apartment complex fight to survive as people across the world mysteriously turn into monsters driven by their innermost desires..

title: Ashiqui
description: musical romance film released in 2013, starring Aditya Roy Kapur and Shraddha Kapoor. The movie tells the story of Rahul, a successful but alcoholic singer, who mentors and falls in love with Arohi, a small-town singer, and helps her rise to fame.

title: Anand
description: Explores themes of life, death, friendship, and the importance of living life to the fullest, even in the face of adversity.

title: AgneePath
description: Agneepath is a story of revenge, centered around Vijay Chauhan, whose father is lynched by a gangster, Kancha Cheena, after being framed

title: Badlapur
description: Badlapur is a Hindi crime thriller where Raghu (Varun Dhawan), a man whose wife and son are killed during a bank robbery, seeks revenge against the perpetrators

title: Bhool Bhulaiya
description: Bhool Bhulaiyaa is a Indian Hindi-language psychological horror comedy film about a couple who move into their ancestral home, ignoring warnings that it is haunted

title: Bahubali
description: tells the story of Shivudu, a man raised in a tribal village who discovers his past and destiny as he embarks on a journey to rescue Devasena from the tyrannical King Bhallaladeva

title: Barfi
description: a 2012 Indian romantic comedy-drama film following the story of Barfi, a deaf and mute man, and his relationships with two women, Shruti and Jhilmil.

title: Bajrangi BhaiJaan
description: Bajrangi Bhaijaan will count as Salman Khan''s best movie. Magnum opus in every way..it is a simple movie with an extraordinary script. A movie about an Indian who helps a Pakistani girl to go back to her country so she can be reunited with her parents. It teaches us that humanity is far above religion.
